§ gemtext-format

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The **gemtext**-format is a [[data-format]] used to create documents.

The **gemtext**-format is associated with the [[gemini-protocol]].

The **gemtext**-format supports:

• [[block-quotation]]
• headings (up to three levels)
• paragraphs
• [[preformatted-text]]
• links (but //not// inline links)
• lists (but //not// nested lists)
